Description: A Potion of Transference allows you to swap avatars with another player
A Dreamcatcher will let you know who visited you in the night

DetailedDescription: A Hvsla Rune allows you to talk to a player the following night.
You will be able to toggle the rune on or off
The other player will see all the messages you send at night but will not know who is sending them.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

Description: An Iron Collar can save you from a single lynch.
A Potion of Transference allows you to swap avatars with another player

DetailedDescription: A war axe can be used to attack another player, it has a 33% chance of killing them.
The attack has a separate 66% chance to maim the target
A maimed player has a chance to die if they visit anyone in the night, the chance increases the further away their visit target
You cannot use a war axe and another item on the same night
A Mystic Vault will allow you to gain one item from its inventory at night
Items surrounded by (brackets) are locked in the vault until all other available items have been cleared
A Mystic Vault will pass automatically to your neighbour directly below you in the player list tomorrow
You do not need to pick an item, but the Mystic Vault will pass regardless
If a Mystic Vault passes to a dead player, it will automatically try to continue its originally planned journey as close as it can
A Mystic Vault cannot be stolen or destroyed, but will disappear when empty

Description: A Potion of Restoration can be used once to recharge a player's limited use abilities (Revivers, Masons, Witches etc)

The Philosopher's Stone is a legendary item long sought by Alchemists. If you hold it for two consecutive nights it will create a random potion. In addition, it will refresh an Alchemist's ability every three nights. Alchemists can hold more than one of their ability potions but can only use one of each type per night.
A Potion of Weakness will role block a single target for one night
